main event: A round, blinking white light was observed in Atlanta, Georgia on August 6, 1957, suspected to be a meteor.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 1 minute and 35 seconds,The weather was clear at the time of the observation,The object was described as bright and diffused,The observer was an amateur astronomer,The director of intelligence suggested that it resembled a meteor but noted the duration might have been overestimated.
